ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: Only place I ve ever had problems with Largos is Guk dead side tower.  And I m still not certain that was what caused us to eat that horrible train. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Only place I've ever had problems with Largos is Guk dead side tower. And
I'm still not certain that was what caused us to eat that horrible train.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 4:42 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards


> My experience with Largo's is that it is safe to sing in dungeon settings.
> The radius of the AE is small enough that it will only effect the mobs you
> are attacking. I have never noticed it aggroing mobs thru walls or in
rooms
> above/below you. I don't think the z-axis bug comes into play with this
> song. I have this song memmed all the time when there is a ranger/druid
or
> when there is no shaman in the group.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
> 39 bard
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 10:20 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
>
>
> Is Largo's safe in Dalnir's? I was hesitant to use it given the three
> levels in Dalnir's. Has anyone else had this song causing mobs to
teleport
> to them or cast on them from different levels?
>
>
>
